entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
